source:
spark.sql(f"""
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE fo_sanctioneddb.FACTTravelExpense
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/fo_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/FACTTravelExpense'
AS
SELECT 
    CAST(PKFACTTravelExpense AS STRING) AS PKFACTTravelExpense,
    CAST(FKActivity AS STRING) AS FKActivity,
    CAST(FKCurrency AS STRING) AS FKCurrency,
    CAST(FKCustomer AS STRING) AS FKCustomer,
    CAST(FKDataArea AS STRING) AS FKDataArea,
    CAST(FKFinancialDimension AS STRING) AS FKFinancialDimension,
    CAST(FKLineProperty AS STRING) AS FKLineProperty,
    CAST(FKProject AS STRING) AS FKProject,
    CAST(FKProjectController AS STRING) AS FKProjectController,
    CAST(FKProjectManager AS STRING) AS FKProjectManager,
    REPLACE(CAST(CAST(FKProjTransDate AS STRING) AS STRING), '-', '') AS FKProjTransDate,  
    CAST(FKSalesManager AS STRING) AS FKSalesManager,
    CAST(FKTravelExpense AS STRING) AS FKTravelExpense,
    CAST(FKUDFCode AS STRING) AS FKUDFCode,
    CAST(AccountingCurrencyReconciledAmount AS DOUBLE) AS AccountingCurrencyReconciledAmount_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(AdditionalInformation AS STRING) AS AdditionalInformation,
    CAST(AmountCURR AS DOUBLE) AS AmountCUR_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(AmountCURR_Unposted AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) AS AmountCUR_Unposted_,  -- Using DECIMAL(18, 2) for numeric
    CAST(AmountMST AS DOUBLE) AS AmountMST_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(AmountMST_Unposted AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) AS AmountMST_Unposted_,  -- Using DECIMAL(18, 2) for numeric
    CAST(CorrectedTaxAmount AS DOUBLE) AS CorrectedTaxAmount_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(CorrectedTaxAmountMST AS DOUBLE) AS CorrectedTaxAmountMST_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(CostType AS STRING) AS CostType,
    CAST(CurrencyCode AS STRING) AS CurrencyCode,
    CAST(Deduktion AS DOUBLE) AS Deduction,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(DeduktionBreakfest AS BIGINT) AS DeductionBreakfast,  -- Using BIGINT for bigint
    CAST(DeduktionLunch AS BIGINT) AS DeductionLunch,  -- Using BIGINT for bigint
    CAST(LineNumber AS DOUBLE) AS LineNumber,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(MerchantID AS STRING) AS MerchantID,
    CAST(Mileage AS DOUBLE) AS Mileage_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(MileageRate AS DOUBLE) AS MileageRate,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(NetTransactionAmount AS DOUBLE) AS NetTransactionAmount_,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(NetTransactionAmount_Unposted AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) AS NetTransactionAmount_Unposted_,  -- Using DECIMAL(18, 2) for numeric
    CAST(ProjectID AS STRING) AS ProjectID,
    CAST(Purpose AS STRING) AS Purpose,
    CAST(Voucher AS STRING) AS Voucher,
    CAST(CHHelpDeskLink AS STRING) AS CHHelpDeskLink,
    CAST(CHHelpText AS STRING) AS CHHelpText,
    CAST(CHChargedescription AS STRING) AS CHChargedDescription,
    CAST(CategoryGroup AS STRING) AS CategoryGroup,
    CAST(ExpenseCategory AS STRING) AS ExpenseCategory,
    CAST(ExpenseReportNumber AS STRING) AS ExpenseReportNumber,
    CAST(FKResource AS STRING) AS FKResource,
    CAST(Advance AS BIGINT) AS Advance,  -- Using BIGINT for bigint
    CAST(ApprovalStatus AS STRING) AS ApprovalStatus,
    CAST(CHDailyRoomRate AS DOUBLE) AS CHDailyRoomRate,  -- Using DOUBLE for float
    CAST(CHDailyRoomRateCurrencyCode AS STRING) AS CHDailyRoomRateCurrencyCode,
    CAST(TotalTaxAmount AS DOUBLE) AS TotalTaxAmount_  -- Using DOUBLE for float
FROM fo_sanctioneddb.CH_FACTTRAVELEXPENSE
""")
